title: Noetherian rings and left modules II

blocks.name: clnr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of left Noetherian rings.

blocks.name: df-lnr
blocks.content: A ring is _left-Noetherian_ iff it is Noetherian as a left module over itself. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: islnr
blocks.content: Property of a left-Noetherian ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: lnrring
blocks.content: Left-Noetherian rings are rings. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: lnrlnm
blocks.content: Left-Noetherian rings have Noetherian associated modules. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: islnr2
blocks.content: Property of being a left-Noetherian ring in terms of finite generation of ideals (the usual "pure ring theory" definition). (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wb(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm)))
  islnr(c0)

  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
  rlmlmod(c0)
  baib(wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clnm), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))))
  islnm2(s0, s1, cfv(crglmod, c0), c1, c2, c3)
  eqtri(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0))

blocks.name: islnr3
blocks.content: Relate left-Noetherian rings to Noetherian-type closure property of the left ideal system. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)

  eqid(cfv(crsp, c0))
  biantrurd(wcel(c0, crg), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(hs1, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmrc, c1), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c1, cfv(cacs, c2)))
  lidlacs(c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: lnr2i
blocks.content: Given an ideal in a left-Noetherian ring, there is a finite subset which generates it. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crsp, c0))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, clnr), wcel(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))

  simprbi(wcel(c0, clnr), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, crg))

  3imtr4g(wcel(c0, clnr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn)), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn))), wa(wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c1), cfn))))

  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, clnr), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c1), cfn))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cfn))))

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ LNoeR ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈(P(c1)⋂ Fin), c1 =(c3 ` s0)), ∃(s0 ∈(P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), c1 =(c3 ` s0)))

  rexbidv(s0, (P((Base ` c0))⋂ Fin), hs0 = c1, hs0 =(c3 ` s0), c1 =(c3 ` s0))
  eqeq1(hs0, c1, (c3 ` s0))

blocks.name: lnrfgtr
blocks.content: A submodule of a finitely generated module over a Noetherian ring is finitely generated. Often taken as the definition of Noetherian ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Feb-2015.)
